attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ask the prime minister to make a rule which forces employers of all sectors of industry to take on qualified people who have spent time in prison and have convictions which can not be spent.To many employers refuse to employ people with convictions making it more likely these people will reoffend.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action, not a word.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
